oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gravesite of Harold Adkins, with flowers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gravesite of Harold Adkins, covered in flowers. Harold was killed after an accident in which he was dragged behind a horse. He was 14 years old at the time that he died. On verso, "Harold Adkins grave".
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Funeral service
